title: Vegan friendly coleslaw
ingredients: ['450g green cabbage, finely chopped', '65g cucumber, chopped', '180g tomatoes, chopped', '75g yellow pepper, chopped', '50g spring onions, chopped', '60g celery, chopped', '4 tablespoons V8 vegetable juice', '4 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 teaspoon caster sugar', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon salsa', '1/2 lemon, juiced', 'salt and pepper to taste']
